quoteText:
When you log in, you need to use at least an email and a password.
Nicknames are optional.
title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states: "When you log in, you need to use at least an email and a password. Nicknames are optional."
